snippet.title: Marble Duel Official Game Trailer
snippet.description:
App Store: http://bit.ly/MarbleDuel-iOS
Google Play: http://bit.ly/MarbleDuel-Android
Steam: http://bit.ly/MD_Steam

Master the destructive power of the spheres and become the most fearsome mage ever!

Game features:
- Master the ancient power of magic spheres!
- Level your mage up to Legendary!
- Improve your magic skills from duel to duel!
- Beat your friends' scores in Facebook
- Be prepared to find very unusual allies.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/herocraft.games
Twitter: http://twitter.com/#!/herocraft
Vkontakte: http://vk.com/herocraft
